headline: Taking Stock of Everest Group’s Valuation After Its Recent Short-Term Share Price Rebound
summary: Everest Group (EG) has quietly outperformed the broader insurance space over the past week, and that short-term strength looks interesting against a year-to-date decline and slightly negative 1 year return. See our latest analysis for Everest Group. That recent 4.2% 7 day share price return, against a negative year to date share price performance and slightly negative 1 year total shareholder return, suggests sentiment is tentatively improving rather than breaking into a clear momentum...

headline: Temenos Named a Leader in Everest Group Peak Matrix® Assessments
summary: Recognition highlights Temenos’ market impact, vision and capabilities in delivering customer experience orchestration products for banks and wealth managersGRAND-LANCY, Switzerland, Dec. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Temenos (SIX: TEMN), a global leader in banking technology, today announced it has been named a leader in two key Everest Group assessments.
